name: Tofu the T-Rex
description:
Central Florida Global Game Jam 2022

Tofu the T-Rex is a rhythm game about a dinosaur who wants two *very* different things. 

Tofu wants to switch to a plant-based diet to be a vegan role model for his little, dancing, baby cousins. 

Unfortunately, Tofu is a large (carnivorous) T-Rex whose instincts tell him to eat all the fresh meat he sees.

There is hope! A new vegan restaurant is opening nearby. All he has to do is make it to the restaurant without giving in to his carnivorous cravings. When he feels his willpower failing, he'll have nearby flora to nibble, giving himself more strength to resist his meaty desires.
